thread.title: Twin girls fight for lives after friend passed on virus | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Twin girls fight for lives after friend passed on virus | Daily Mail Online

author: Belinda Cleary For Daily Mail Australia
title: Twin girls fight for lives after friend passed on virus | Daily Mail Online
text: 'I just can't believe someone decided they would risk it': Mother's warning for every parent as her twin baby girls fight for their lives after friend 'with a cold' came to visit Twin girls Harper and Harlow are fighting for their lives in a Melbourne hospital The six-week-old girls became sick after a friend 'with a cold' came to see them Their mother, Laura Wallis, 25, is angry her house-guests visited when sick Ms Wallis says she told her friends premature babies were more at risk of germs She said she is furious she was ignored and is terrified of losing her babies Published: 10:45 GMT, 25 February 2017 | Updated: 12:48 GMT, 25 February 2017 345 shares
